commands.description: Report a snapshot of current processes running on the system.
commands.usecase: Find all running nginx processes with detailed information
commands.author: Michael K. Johnson

commands.description: Send signals to processes, typically to terminate them.
commands.usecase: Forcefully terminate a process with PID 12345
commands.author: Salvatore Valente

commands.description: Control the systemd system and service manager.
commands.usecase: Restart the Apache web server service
commands.author: Lennart Poettering, Kay Sievers

commands.description: Interactive process viewer with color-coded display.
commands.usecase: Monitor system resources with an improved interface
commands.author: Hisham Muhammad

commands.description: Send signals to processes based on name and other attributes.
commands.usecase: Kill all processes with 'python' in their command line
commands.author: Kjetil Torgrim Homme

commands.description: Run a command with modified scheduling priority.
commands.usecase: Run a script with lower priority to reduce system impact
commands.author: David MacKenzie
